question:
Which of the following led to launch of Khilafat Movement in India?
  1. Defeat of Khalifa in World War 1
  2. Call of Mahatma Gandhi to Ali Brothers to launch such movement
  3. Differences of Ali Brothers with All India Muslim League
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Gandhi had not called the ali brothers to launch Khilafat Movement. First the leaders met, then Published their Khilafat manifesto and after only that there was a unwritten pact between INC and Khilafat Movement to work and cooperate on agitation. Gandhi gave them a call to participate in NCM, because he (Gandhi) thought that it was only remedy for British. Thus only 1 stands correct in this question.
